data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
In the minute 1, Free kick Cagliari.
Juraj Kucka (Parma Calcio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Juraj Kucka (Parma Calcio) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Cagliari's Nahitan Nandez is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Parma Calcio's area.
In the minute 8, Juraj Kucka (Parma Calcio) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 9, Throw-in high up the field for Parma Calcio in Parma.
Cagliari will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 12, Ivano Pezzuto blows against Parma Calcio's Simone Iacoponi for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a Cagliari throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
In the minute 15, Free kick in a good position for Cagliari!
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Riccardo Sottil of Cagliari smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 17, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Matteo Scozzarella is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Cagliari are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 19, Matteo Scozzarella, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Simon Sohm is the substitute for Parma Calcio.
Ivano Pezzuto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Parma Calcio.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Parma Calcio.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 22, Can Parma Calcio capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Roberto Inglese for the home team is judged to be offside.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Parma Calcio just outside Cagliari's area.
In the minute 25, Christian Oliva (Cagliari) has received a first yellow card.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Giuseppe Pezzella for Parma Calcio who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 28, Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Riccardo Gagliolo (Parma Calcio) has replaced the possibly injured Giuseppe Pezzella at Ennio Tardini.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Can Parma Calcio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
Parma Calcio's Jasmin Kurtic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ivano Pezzuto awards Cagliari a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Parma Calcio drive forward but Gervinho is judged offside.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio's Simone Iacoponi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Cagliari at Ennio Tardini.
Ivano Pezzuto awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 37, Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cagliari needs to be cautious. Parma Calcio have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
In the minute 43, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Parma Calcio.
In the minute 44, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a throw-in for Parma Calcio, close to Cagliari's area.
In Parma Parma Calcio attack through Riccardo Gagliolo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the away team in Parma.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Giovanni Simeone is replacing Alberto Cerri for the away team.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Parma Calcio.
In the minute 47, Cagliari drives forward and Giovanni Simeone gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ivano Pezzuto awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
In the minute 51, Cagliari's Joao Pedro goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Parma.
Parma Calcio are pushing forward but Jasmin Kurtic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 53, Cagliari have a goal kick.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 57, In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Parma.
In Parma Cagliari drive forward through Riccardo Sottil. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 61, Parma Calcio are coming forward and Roberto Inglese gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Throw-in Cagliari.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In the minute 65, Cagliari push forward at Ennio Tardini and Ragnar Klavan gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Parma Calcio defence.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 67, Simone Iacoponi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Parma Calcio.
Simone Iacoponi of Parma Calcio is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 70, Parma Calcio's Gervinho breaks free at Ennio Tardini. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Parma.
Sebastian Walukiewicz is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 71, The away team has substituted Sebastian Walukiewicz with Luca Ceppitelli. Eusebio Di Francesco is thus making his second change.
The home team replace Roberto Inglese with Andreas Cornelius.
Parma Calcio make their fourth substitution with Juan Brunetta replacing Yann Karamoh.
In the minute 72, Hernani is on a sub for Gervinho for Parma Calcio.
Throw-in Cagliari.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 74, Cagliari to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Parma Calcio have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 78, In Parma a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Razvan Marin is replacing Christian Oliva for Cagliari at Ennio Tardini.
Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 80, Play has been interrupted briefly in Parma to check on Babis Lykogiannis, who is grimacing with pain.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Parma Calcio just outside Cagliari's area.
Parma Calcio surge into the attack at Ennio Tardini but Bruno Alves’s header is off-target.
In the minute 81, Ivano Pezzuto awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Babis Lykogiannis returns to the field for Cagliari after picking up a slight injury.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
In the minute 83, Juan Brunetta of Parma Calcio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Attention is being given to Cagliari’s Babis Lykogiannis and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 83, Eusebio Di Francesco (Cagliari) is making a fourth change, with Andrea Carboni replacing the possibly injured Babis Lykogiannis.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Ennio Tardini.
Cagliari make their fifth substitution with Matteo Tramoni replacing Riccardo Sottil.
In the minute 85, Cagliari needs to be cautious. Parma Calcio have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, Parma Calcio pushes forward through Juan Brunetta, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Parma Calcio.
Juraj Kucka (Parma Calcio) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 89, Parma Calcio drive upfield and Jasmin Kurtic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Parma Calcio advance rapidly upfield but Ivano Pezzuto blows for offside.
Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Parma Calcio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Parma.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Cagliari.
Parma Calcio's Andreas Cornelius has run offside.
Joao Pedro for Cagliari gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
Andreas Cornelius (Parma Calcio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
